    Git Commands #

    Branches #

    Creating new Branch #

    Before creating a new branch, pull the changes from upstream

    git pull

    Create branch locally and switch to it

    git checkout -b [new_branch_name]

    You could also do

    git branch [new_branch_name]
    git checkout [new_branch_name]
    Git
